question: Hamed Bakayoko, who died recently was the Prime Minister of which country?
explanation:
The Prime Minister of Ivory Coast - Hamed Bakayoko died recently of cancer in Germany. He was 56 years old.
He was appointed as the nationâ€™s PM in the July 2020 after the death of his predecessor Amadou Gou. He was chosen by the President Ouattara. He founded the newspaper named Le Patriote 1990's.
